AppicationSubmissionInfo.FormAndInfoAndMaterials: A letter stating the amount requested and the purpose for the funds.
AppicationSubmissionInfo.RestrictionsOnAwards: Contributions will be made exclusively for charitable, scientific, literary, or educational purposes either directly or by contributions to organizations that qualify as exempt organizations under section 501(c)3 of the Internal Revenue Code and its regulations. There are no policy restrictions as to geographic area, charitable fields, or dollar amounts awarded.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1: American Wind Power Center and Museum
